name: That What Lurks
description:
Description:

That What Lurks is a short horror game developed by me and a colleague for a school assignment. You play as Daniel, a forest guard, as he envelops himself in a mystery regarding the disappearance of a child.

Features:
  • A single-player story driven game with an immersive narrative;
  • Dialogue and action options;
  • Interactable objects and NPCs;
  • Compelling puzzles;
  • Village in the woods setting;
Controls:Keyboard:

ENTER to start the game;

WASD/Arrow keys to move;

Z to interact with people/objects;

ENTER to open the pause menu.

Game Boy/Smartphone

START/Options to start the game;

Arrow keys to move;

A to interact with people/objects;

Start/Options to open the pause menu.

The Team:

André Clérigo 

João Cavaco
